description.p: mtoc is a modern music player and library browser that emphasizes visual richness by featuring album art prominently while maintaining high performance.

ul.li: Visual album browsing with smooth, continuous scrolling
High-performance playback with gapless audio support
MPRIS integration for system media controls
Support for common audio formats (MP3, MP4/M4A, FLAC, OGG)
Smart library management with automatic metadata extraction
Hardware-accelerated rendering for smooth UI performance
